com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.jdbc

Class JdbcPeerApplicationBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.configuration.AbstractConfigurable
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.ComponentHelper
        • com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.jdbc.JdbcPeerApplicationBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IHasAttributes, IConfigurable, IRegisterable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultJdbcApplicationReader, DefaultJdbcApplicationWriter

    public class JdbcPeerApplicationBase
extends ComponentHelper
    Base class for default JDBC implementations of IPeerApplicationWriter and IPeerApplicationReader.

    • Method Detail

      • closeComponent

        public boolean closeComponent()
                       throws Exception
        Description copied from class: ComponentHelper
        If the component is already closed, this method does nothing. Otherwise it marks the component as closed (ie not open) and unregisters it from the ComponentRegistry
        Specified by:
        closeComponent in interface IComponent
        Overrides:
        closeComponent in class ComponentHelper
        Returns:
        Previous open state.
        Throws:
        Exception - if it was unable to completely close. It should not throw an exception until it has closed itself as fully as possible.

      • refreshStateFromAttributes

        public void refreshStateFromAttributes()
                                throws Exception
        Refreshes the state of this object from the values of its configured attributes. The 'queryTimeoutInSeconds', 'driver', 'url', 'user', 'password', 'passwordStore' attributes are refreshed.
        Specified by:
        refreshStateFromAttributes in interface IHasAttributes
        Overrides:
        refreshStateFromAttributes in class ComponentHelper
        Throws:
        Exception - If the refresh failed for any reason.
        See Also:
        JdbcAdapter Attributes

      • setComponentActive

        public boolean setComponentActive(boolean active)
                           throws Exception
        Description copied from class: ComponentHelper
        Simply stores active state.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • createStatement

        protected final PreparedStatement createStatement(String sql,
                                                  boolean isStoredProc,
                                                  int numPlaceholderParams)
                                           throws SQLException
        Create a prepared statement.
        Parameters:
        sql - The SQL from which to create the statement. This may either be SQL code or the name of a stored procedure. In the latter case the isStoredProc parameter must also be set.
        isStoredProc - True if the specified sql is the name of a stored procedure, false if it is SQL.
        numPlaceholderParams - The number of place holder parameters in the supplied sql.
        Returns:
        a prepared statement
        Throws:
        SQLException - On error creating the prepared statement.
